chapters.name: Chapter 136: The Fall of a Mountain
Chapter 412: The Strong and The Weak

name: Planet Pulverizer: A Mortal's Ascent
summary: Transmigrated from the Blue Planet, Li Pin, once an ordinary university student, found himself thrust into a world of ferocious beasts and demonic creatures. Haunted by the loss of his parents to illness in his previous life, he yearned to understand the fragility and potential of human life.In a realm dominated by Astral Cultivators, Li Pins determination to push the boundaries of human potential was unwavering. Driven by the question, What are the true limits of the human body? he embarked on a perilous journey into the world of martial arts.Would he ascend to the pinnacle of power, unravel the mysteries of the human body, and truly comprehend the essence of martial arts?
author: Windrider Swordmaster
